TextView.tools:text: Summary of the Class defining structures

Resilience – It allows you to put into specification how payments will be made—in installments, at a future date, or on demand.Brief and Highly Detached – You do not need to have a promissory note notarized, and there is also no need to record it to be legit. You can use a promissory note as an unsecured loan and make your collateral ready to secure a bank or certain types of loans.Convertible – You can draw potential investors’ attention through the use of a convertible promissory note. Prospective investors may be interested in your company and think that you have enough cash flow for reimbursement.
